content: आराधनं {@--1@} Pleasing, satisfaction, entertainment, gratification; येषामाराधनाय <ls>U. 1</ls>; यदि वा जानकीमपि आराधनाय लोकानां मुंचतो नास्ति मे व्यथा <ls n="U.">1. 12</ls>, <ls n="U. 1.">41.</ls> {@--2@} Serving, worshipping, adoration, propitiation (as of a deity); आराधनायास्य सखीसमेताम् <ls>Ku. 1. 58</ls>; <ls>Bg. 7. 22</ls>; कृतमाराधनं रवेः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} A means of pleasing; इदं तु ते भक्तिनम्रं सतामाराधनं वपुः <ls>Ku. 6. 73.</ls> {@--4@} Honouring, respecting; <ls>U. 4. 17.</ls> {@--5@} Cooking. {@--6@} Accomplishment, undertaking. {@--7@} Acquirement, attainment; <ls>Bh. 3. 4.</ls> --ना Service. --नी Worship, adoration, propitiation (of a deity).
